statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Given an integer $n$, we only want to know the sum of $1/k^2$ where $k$ from $1$ to $n$.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
There are multiple cases.
For each test case, there is a single line, containing a single positive integer $n$.
The input file is at most 1M.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: The required sum, rounded to the fifth digits after the decimal point.
